title: Distance Mathematics Education Design for Adult Learners: Interaction-Enhanced Strategies

context.additional_context: Focuses on improving everyday mathematical application skills for non-degree-seeking adult learners in a digital device-provided environment.

learning_goals: Learners can perform fraction/decimal operations with 80% accuracy to solve real-life problems
Learners share mathematical problem-solving strategies at least three times through interactions with peer learners on an online discussion board
Learners can explain basic statistical concepts with 90% comprehension using multimedia content within the LMS
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
